articles.title: Trump hits India with extra 25% tariff for buying Russian oil - BBC
articles.description: India, which now faces among the highest tariff rates imposed by the US, called the levy "unjustified and unreasonable".
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump has issued an executive order hitting India with an additional 25% tariff over its purchases of Russian oil. 
That will raise the total tariff on Indian imports to the Unit… [+3837 chars]
